version_description:
1. [Main Story - Chapter IV] unleashed with 5 brand new tracks!
- Sultan Rage by Monst Death
- Class Memories by Antistar feat. Ctymax
- -SURREALISM- by Itsuki
- Bonus Time by Megalo_PaleWhite
- Energy Synergy Matrix by Tanchiky

2. Added FC/AP indicator. You can enable it from the [Settings].

3. Various bug fixes.

1. Added 3 new songs for “闫东炜Selection 2”:
Aphasia
華灯爱
开心病

2. Upgraded the statistic UI to “Name Card”

3.Fixed some audio issues for numerous devices. If you still are experiencing audio issues, please leave a comment below in TapTap with the subject of “Audio Issues”.

1. Updated 3 singles

Find_Me
Sein
狂喜蘭舞

2. Added “Single Collection” and “Shop”

3. Fixed some audio issues. If you are still experiencing audio issues, please leave a comment below on the thread “audio issues” in TapTap.

1. New Song Added:
- Sparkle New Life
2. Fixed the display bug of [Service Fee].
3. Added tutorial in [Shop].
4. New Hit Effect.

- New Chapter V added with 5 brand new songs:
NYA!!! - FLuoRiTe/姜米條
JunXion Between Life And Death (VIP Mix) - 1N6Fs
cryout - Ju_E
Reimei - 影虎。
尊師 ～The Guru～ - rider

- [Collections] system is ready!

- A slot machine has been introduced to the [Shop]!

- A new setting added that can help fix audio glitches in game. If your device is encountering audio issues, please go to [Settings] and check this out.

- Some visual adjustments.

1. Fixed an issue where chapter selection menu disappears.
2. Fixed an issue where a collection cannot be collected.
3. Modified some text in [Collections].
4. Fixed the bug that muted the note sound when entering the hidden song for the first time.
5.Adjustments in [Data Mining].

Added two new songs: 
Next Time
Rubbish Sorting

v1.x.x Update Log

1. 5 Brand new tracks from Rising Sun Traxx!

Another Me
mechanted
life flashes before weeb eyes
Break Through The Barrier
Chronostasis

2. Some visual adjustments.

1. A new song to play with:
Dead Soul

2. Nothing more. Please sit back and enjoy.

1.[HyuN Collection] Unleashed with 3 brand new songs:

Infinity Heaven
Disorder
CROSS†SOUL

1.[HyuN Collection] Unleashed with 3 brand new songs:

Infinity Heaven
Disorder
CROSS†SOUL

1. All songs are 50% OFF in this version!

2. Added two new songs: 
Speed Up!
Magenta Potion

3. New song selection UI and visual improvements.

4. New players will get 32MB + when clearing the tutorial for the first time. (880000 score needed)

5. Now you will get 512KB when checking the new collections for the first time.

1. All songs are 50% OFF in this version!

2. Added two new songs: 
Speed Up!
Magenta Potion

3. New song selection UI and visual improvements.

4. New players will get 32MB + when clearing the tutorial for the first time. (880000 score needed)

5. Now you will get 512KB when checking the new collections for the first time.

1. Added 1 new single:
Get Back


2.A series of bug fixes.

1. Added 1 new single:
Palescreen

2. Fix bugs

1. Added 1 new single in Main Chapter 5:
Leave All Behind

Will appear upon clearing Main Chapter 5.

1. Added GOOD Collection, including 5 brand new songs:

GOODTEK
GOODBOUNCE
GOODWORLD
GOODFORTUNE
GOODRAGE

2. Enhanced game performance on some devices

1. Main Chapter 6 arrives with 5 songs to play:
- Colorful Days
- micro.wav
- 重生
- NO ONE YES MAN
- 望影の方舟Six

2. A brand-new collaboration song with MYSUNX!
The Mountain Eater

3. New collection items for Chapter 2 and some Ex chapters.

4. Revamped lots of old charts. Some have been completely re-charted.

5. Added a lot more text guideposts in-game for newcomers to find their path to mastery!
Bug fixed.

1. Added two new singles:
Orthodox
End Me

2. Fixed a bug that may cause players unable to access Single collection.

3. Added legacy charts for some modified levels.
Fixed bugs.
Fixed bugs.

1. Added 2 new singles:
SIGMA
Electron

2. Fixed several bugs and optimized the audio system. Please re-adjust the Audio Offset in [Settings].

1. New Side Story I with 5 new songs:
Ποσειδών
WATER
Miracle Forest (VIP Mix)
MOBILYS
Lyrith -迷宮リリス-

2. Fixed the bug of not being able to click the enter of the screen.

3. Fixed the judgement issue of Hold notes in [PRAW] and MARENOL IN.

4. Replaced the song at the Store page.

1, Updated 1 new song
Hardcore Kwaya

2,Slightly modified [IN]chart for Sein

Merry Christmas!
1. Three new singles:
Äventyr
Träne
雪降り、メリクリ

2. New song selection menu in [Singles].

1. Added 2 new singles:
Cervelle Connexion
modulus

2.Fixed an issue where 「Ποσειδών」 cannot be played.

1. [姜米條 Collection] is now out with 3 new songs:
Shadow
Anomaly

2. Fixed an issue where images load slowly on some devices.

4. Reverted the illustration of Pixel Rebelz to the first version.

5. Corrected the difficulty of modulus [IN].

1. A brand new single to play:
Wavetapper - Frums

2. Fixed some information display errors.

3. Fixed an issue where Legacy charts could not be played.

4. Nothing else! Just sit back and enjoy!

1. 2 brand new singles:
Eltaw
大和撫子 -Wild Dances-

2. Fixed the bug of Hold notes lasting longer than song duration in some charts.

3. Fixed incorrect information displayed for certain Legacy charts.
1. Added WAVEAT Collection, 4 songs included.Initialize桜樹街道Get Ready!! volcanic2. Added a brand new single：Better Graphic Animation

1. Added Muse Dash Collection, with 3 new songs:

Final Step!
Cthugha

2. Fixed the error of certain charts showing wrong difficulty level.

1. Two brand new singles:
Unorthodox Thoughts
With You

2. Fixed some audio issues on certain models. Please re-calibrate after the update.

1. Two brand new Singles:
Apocalyptic
游园地

2. Added account system. Account registration is temporarily disabled, please enter the game in offline mode for the time being.

1. 1 brand new single:
energy trixxx

1. New main Chapter VII - [Chronnection]. Contains 5 tracks:

•「Clock Paradox」by WyvernP
•「Chronomia」by Lime
•「Nick of Time」by P4koo
•「Chronologika」by Hundotte

•「Nhelv」 by Silentroom
•「-Arkhei-」by Sera Amagi
•「Kerberos」by Zris


3. New AT difficulty for db doll.


4. Brand new 2.0 UI.

New refreshing UI, with greatly improved user experience. Hope you little pigeons enjoy!


5. New Challenge Mode.

Challenge your ability with stricter judgement!


6. New Collections.

Added [Side Story 1]. Piece together a wonderful chapter of Lotos with a series of new fragments.

12. Now highlighting simultaneous notes for Hold.


13. Added screen direction lock function during gameplay.


14. Fixed a series of BUGs.
